page.title: 14MEETINGS HELD IN KNOWBURY
page.content: Twice a week, on Tuesday and Thursday, the{Play_Group}meet. Children between the age of 3_5 can go along and do activities, such as painting. There is also a{Mother and {Toddler group.}The Mums take their toddlers along and stop with them while they play. On a Wednesday, the{ {Brownie Pack}meet. The girls are aged 7_10. On the second Thursday of every month the{Women's Institute}meets. They have interesting talks and demonstrations. There is also a{Keep {Fit Class}once a week. For the over 60s there is a{Primrose Club.}The old people meet once a week to play Bingo, cards, talk and go on outings. On the 1st. Thursday in every month, there is a{Parish Council {Meeting,}where they discuss local affairs.
